local_intent: Push the T-block 0.2 m toward +X (direction_deg=0) after alignment and yaw=90°, then verify goal visibility.
assumptions: Goal region lies approximately along +X from the block.
Single straight push is sufficient without regrasp.
coherence_with_global: Follows GLOBAL_BT: detect t_block and goal_area, move above, approach and align (0.01), set yaw 90, push 0.2 at 0°, check goal visibility, retreat 0.1.
